entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quinte West
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:09 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 01:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow late in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
